name: faraday plate suit
description: A suit of Gothic plate armor, complete with gloves, gauntlets, and a barbute helmet.  It has been conductively interconnected, protecting against electricity.

name: leather jumpsuit
description: A short-sleeved jumpsuit made from thick leather.  Provides decent storage and proteciton, and is not very encumbering.

name: XL leather jumpsuit
description: A tough, short-sleeved leather jumpsuit updated for the trans-human who needs full-body clothing.  Provides some storage and is adjustable to minimize encumbrance.

name: armored leather jumpsuit
description: An armored short-sleeved jumpsuit made from thick leather and metal plates.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from harm.

name: XL armored leather jumpsuit
description: A tough, short-sleeved armored leather jumpsuit updated for the trans-human who needs full-body clothing.  Provides some storage and is adjustable to minimize encumbrance.

name.str: pair of XL leather arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL leather arm guards

description: A pair of massive tough leather arm guards.  Fairly light and comfortable.

name.str: pair of XL leather armor gauntlets
name.str_pl: pairs of XL leather armor gauntlets

description: Heavy and massive fingerless leather gloves.  Very flexible and comfortable.
A massive pair of black leather gloves.

name: XL leather armor helmet
description: A massive and thick leather helmet that provides excellent protection for the head.

name: XL scrap suit
description: A massive suit of armor made from scraps of metal secured by simple strings; provides decent protection, but the loose collection of plates doesn't make for the most convenient protection.

name.str: pair of XL metal arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL metal arm guards

description: A massive pair of arm guards hammered out from metal.  Perfect for the Post-Apocalyptic Warrior look.
A massive pair of iron leg guards with a simple leather lining.
Massive gauntlets made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Very light and durable.

name.str: pair of XL biosilicified chitin gauntlets
name.str_pl: pairs of XL biosilicified chitin gauntlets

description: Massive gauntlets crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant and very durable.

name: XL chitinous helmet
description: A massive helmet made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Covers the entire head; very light and durable.

name: XL biosilicified chitin helmet
description: A massive helmet crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Covers the entire head; acid-resistant and very durable.

name.str: pair of XL chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL chitin arm guards

description: A pair of massive arm guards made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Light and durable.

name.str: pair of XL biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL biosilicified chitin arm guards

description: A pair of massive arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant and very durable.

name: XL chitinous armor
description: Massive leg and body armor made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Light and durable.

name: XL biosilicified chitin armor
description: Massive leg and body armor crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant and very durable.
A massive, snug fitting pair of gloves made from thin and lightweight Nomex fire-resistant fabric.  Tough yet breathable, they are light and comfortable to wear under clothing.

name: XL flame-resistant hood
description: A massive, snug fitting garment that protects your head and neck, made from lightweight Nomex fire-resistant fabric.  Tough yet breathable, it is light and comfortable to wear under clothing.
A massive, snug fitting pair of stockings made from thin and lightweight Nomex fire-resistant fabric.  Tough yet breathable, they are light and comfortable to wear under clothing.

name: flame-resistant suit
description: A massive, snug body suit made from thin and lightweight Nomex fire-resistant fabric.  Tough yet breathable, it is light and comfortable to wear under clothing.

name: XL sleeveless trenchcoat
description: A massive cotton trenchcoat that leaves your arms unencumbered.  Has plenty of storage space due to its many pockets.

name: XL sleeveless leather trenchcoat
description: A massive leather trenchcoat without sleeves, leaving your arms unencumbered.  Has plenty of storage space due to its many pockets.

name: XL trenchcoat
description: A massive cotton trenchcoat, lined with pockets.  Great for storage.

name: XL leather trenchcoat
description: A massive leather trenchcoat, lined with pockets.  Great for storage.

name: XL duster
description: A massive full-length duster coat.  Has many pockets for storage.

name: XL leather duster
description: A massive leather full-length duster.  Has many pockets for storage.

name: XL sleeveless duster
description: A massive full-length duster that leaves your arms unencumbered.  Has plenty of storage space due to its many pockets.

name: XL sleeveless leather duster
description: A massive leather full-length duster without sleeves, leaving your arms unencumbered.  Has plenty of storage space due to its many pockets.
A massive pair of pants lined with pockets, offering lots of storage.
A massive pair of shorts lined with pockets, offering decent storage.

name: XL plate armor
description: A massive suit of Gothic plate armor.
An extremely heavy set of massive armor-plated leather gloves.

name: XL barbute helm
description: A massive medieval helmet that provides excellent protection for the head, with a Y shaped opening for the face.

name: XL great helm
description: A massive medieval helmet that provides excellent protection to the entire head, at the cost of great encumbrance.

name: XL O-yoroi
description: A massive ornamental suit of Japanese samurai armor.

name: XL kabuto
description: A massive medieval Japanese helmet with a scowling facemask that provides excellent protection to the entire head and face.

name: XL faraday plate suit
description: A massive suit of Gothic plate armor, complete with boots, gauntlets, and a barbute helmet.  It has been conductively interconnected, protecting against electricity.

name.str: pair of XL steel arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL steel arm guards

description: A massive full assembly of medieval arm protection.  Rerebraces, couters, and vambraces, with leather straps to secure each piece and connect it as part of a set.
A massive steel breastplate, and a vital part of plate armor.  Even as full armor went into decline, cuirasses remained in use among cavalry in Europe.

name.str: pair of XL steel leg guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL steel leg guards

description: A masive full assembly of medieval leg protection.  Cuisses, poleyns, and greaves, with leather straps to secure each piece and connect it as part of a set.

name: XL faraday chainmail suit
description: A massive, fully customized chainmail suit.  The coif, shirt, arms, and leggings have been modified with leather straps to deal with uneven weight distribution and to allow them to be used separately.  It has been combined with a set of armored boots and gauntlets and conductively interconnected, protecting against electricity.

name: XL chainmail armor
description: A massive fully customized chainmail suit.  The coif, shirt, arms, and leggings have been modified with leather straps to deal with uneven weight distribution and to allow them to be used separately.
Massive customized chainmail arms.  Each sleeve has leather straps to connect them with each other.  The lack of fingers makes them less cumbersome and allows them to be used with gloves.

name: XL chainmail coif
description: A massive customized chainmail hood.  Can be worn comfortably under helmets.
Massive customized chainmail legs.  Their leather straps keep everything in place, and the lack of toes and heels allows them to work perfectly well with footwear.

name: chainmail vest
description: A customized chainmail vest.  It's a sleeveless piece of chainmail with small leather straps designed to better distribute the weight.
Massive leather boots.  Very durable.

name.str: pair of XL leather armor boots
name.str_pl: pairs of XL leather armor boots

description: Massive leather boots made specifically to protect the feet.  Light and tough.
An extremely heavy set of massive armor plated boots.
Massive boots made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Light and durable.

name.str: pair of XL biosilicified chitin boots
name.str_pl: pairs of XL biosilicified chitin boots

description: Massive boots crafted from carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant and very durable.

name: XL backpack
description: A large backpack.  Good storage for a little encumbrance.

name: XL leather backpack
description: A large leather backpack.  Good storage for a little encumbrance.

name: XL duffel bag
description: A massive duffel bag.  Provides plenty of storage, but is severely encumbering.

name: XL tool belt
description: A massive belt with pockets and four small belt loops.  Widely used by handymen and electricians if handymen and electricians were bears.

name: XL chest rig
description: A massive vest covered in webbing, pockets and straps.  This variety is favored by the military, as it is capable of holding four magazines close at hand.

name.str: pair of XL drop leg pouches
name.str_pl: pairs of XL drop leg pouches

description: A massive set of pouches that can be worn on the thighs using buckled straps.  This variety is favored by the military.

name: tire armor
description: Makeshift armor made from parts of cut up tires.  Incredibly thick and tough but just as encumbering.

name: XL tire armor
description: Massive makeshift armor made from parts of cut up tires.  Incredibly thick and tough but just as encumbering.

name: hard chest protector
description: A polyurethane chest protector with neoprene backing.

name: conductive suit
description: A one piece conductive suit used in linework.  Provides decent physical protection and full protection against electricity.  The hood is designed to fit over a hardhat.

name: floating backpack
description: A small backpack with a special rail system designed to reduce the load felt by the wearer when moving up and down.  Good storage for very little encumbrance.

name: floating rucksack
description: A huge military rucksack with a special rail system designed to reduce the load felt by the wearer when moving up and down, provides a lot of storage for moderate encumbrance.
